'''Andúril''' is the tenth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].  The 2 minute and 36 second work is instrumental music with a background of soft choral voices.  For the compact disc [[Philippa Boyens]] adapted text by Tolkien (translated by [[David Salo]]) that is associated with the music (see below).

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Behold! Andúril;
Flame of the West.
The Blade that was broken,
Has been remade!
</poem>

:In [[Sindarin]]:

<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Elo! Andúril;
Lach en Annûn
I charthol asgannen
Ad echannen
</poem>
{{title}}
